text:
The JSP 1.2 TLD DTD, web-jsptaglibrary_1_2.dtd, lists only three possible 
values for the body-content element: tagdependent, JSP, or empty.  Case should 
be preserved, so the instances in fmt.tld and fmt-rt.tld where EMPTY is used 
(requestEncoding and locale) should be replaced by empty.
creator: jdpierce75@hotmail.com
jdpierce75@hotmail.com
text:
I downloaded the latest full nightly build (from April 15th) and discovered the 
same problem for setTimeZone and setBundle.

text: This is going to be fixed in tonight's build.
